For assistance, call the following number:
(800) 290-0523
How do I update my information?

Updating your information is quick and easy. Simply login to your account through your VURVhealth app or on the website, and update the information directly. Your information will instantly save and update.
How do I change my password?
You can change your password directly in the profile section of the VURVhealth app or within your account on a desktop computer.

Just need really reliable and affordable Dental & Vision? VURVPULSE discount plan gives you just that! Save instantly on most all dental exams and procedures, including root canals, crowns, and even cosmetic dentistry. Save instantly on eye exams and eyeglasses. VURVCARE also gets you free access to Alternate Health consultations with physicians, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
Smile with savings discounts on most dental procedures including exams, root canals, crowns, and even cosmetic dentistry. See instant savings on eye exams and eyeglasses.

"VURV360 has you totally covered! Enjoy all savings of VURVPULSE and VURVCARE in one ultimate package and see what a difference this easy, affordable discount plan makes to manage your and your family's good health. It's as easy as sign-up and show up with your card. That's it!"
Each member will be an additional $XX.XX to your annual bill.
An email with instructions to reset your password has been sent to:
Enjoy the full savings discounts of Pulse and Care in one ultimate package!
No pharmacies at your current location
Search for participating VURVhealth hospitals, urgent care, medical service centers, practices and clinics.
Pharmacist: Card must be presented to receive program benefits.
For general inquiries, billing or membership related questions, please contact
For processing questions, please call Argus Health Systems, Inc. at 1-866-921-7286.
Please enter your email or mobile number and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
How do I upgrade my membership?

Once we have your billing information, upgrades are simple and instant. You can upgrade your existing membership inside the VURVhealth app by navigating to Change Package under your profile or by clicking here.
How can I pay for my VURVhealth membership?

VURVhealth memberships can be paid monthly or annually using most major credit and debit Cards. You can enter or edit your billing information by navigating to your profile within the VURVhealth app and click on Edit Billing.
How often will I be charged?
Premium VURVhealth memberships bill in monthly cycles, but you can save 20% by clicking here to lock in annual pricing.
How does your cancellation policy work?

We believe that the cancellation process should be as easy as the sign-up process. Simply navigate to your profile within the VURVhealth app and click on Stop Subscription and follow the prompts. We hope you come back soon

For general inquiries, billing or membership related questions, please contact help@vurvhealth.com or visit
www.VURVhealth.com/help
Before you can get a VURV ID, we need to collect some information.
Please go to settings and enable location services for VURVhealth
Enjoy the full savings discounts of Pulse and Care in one ultimate package!
Health care provider: Call 888–858–7427 for reimbursement information
Present your VURV ID to a participating pharmacy to receive a discount on your prescription.
Is this a covered benefit under my health plan?
No, it is a program that offers VURVhealth members up to a 25 percent discount on health improvement services.
Chiropractic care, podiatry, physical therapy, and occupational therapy are already included as part of my health plan benefit. How does this discount program impact my current benefit?

If you have a chiropractic, podiatry, physical therapy, or occupational therapy medical benefit under your health plan, you may want to use this discount program after you have reached your annual plan limits, or for services not covered under that benefit.
Do I need a referral or pre-authorization?

"No. Whether you are an HMO, POS or PPO member, you do not need to get referrals or pre-authorizations to take advantage of this discount program. Just follow the three-step process of: 1) selecting a participating provider, 2) scheduling an appointment, and 3) receiving and paying for services."
Do I need to submit claim forms?
Do I need permission to change participating providers in the middle of a treatment plan?
No. You may change providers at any time.

VURVhealth has partnered with the ChooseHealthy Program administered by American Specialty Health Administrators, Inc. to give members access to more than 37,000 credentialed specialty healthcare practitioners and health improvement services including:
What types of discounts can I expect?
Save 20% to 50% on most dental procedures including routine oral exams, unlimited cleanings, and major work such as dentures, root canals, and crowns
20% savings on orthodontics including braces and retainers for children and adults
"20% reduction on specialist's normal fees. Specialties include: Endodontics, Oral Surgery, Pediatric Dentistry, Periodontics, and Prosthodontics where available"
Cosmetic dentistry such as bonding and veneers also included
All dentists must meet highly selective credentialing standards based on education, background, license standing and other requirements
Members may visit any participating dentist on the plan and change providers at any time
All VURVhealth plan members subscribed to the Care Package Discount Plan.
"What if I'm unhappy with my service and want to change the dentists?"

Members may visit any participating dentist on the plan and change providers at any time. All dentists must meet highly selective credentialing standards based on education, background, license standing and other requirements.

VURVhealth members may take advantage of savings offered by an industry leader in dental care. Careington International Corporation is one of the most recognized professional dental networks in the nation and boasts one of the largest dental networks nationally with a focus on neighborhood dentists. Careington networks are a leader in member-transparent pricing with robust fee schedules.

"VURVhealth is a new way for all Americans to save on their out-of-pocket medical costs. Our nationwide database of quality physicians, facilities, and health specialists provides access to low, pre-negotiated cash prices on thousands of health and wellness treatments and services.
We are the cure for high out-of-pocket medical costs. No matter if you're insured, uninsured, or something in between you may be paying too much for the care you need. VURVhealth helps make health and wellness accessible, affordable, and hassle-free where traditional insurance falls short."
How does VUVRhealth save me money?

"Most health care providers offer discounted cash prices to patients who pay cash upfront (or \"out-of-pocket\") instead of using insurance. VURVhealth negotiates on behalf of our members to lock in EVEN MORE SAVINGS off the cash rate.
Think of your VURVhealth membership like a coupon that you apply at checkout. When you visit a doctor or facility from our nationwide database, you'll save instantly with the lowest possible out-of-pocket rate. There's no paperwork, hassles, or waiting to be reimbursed."
Who can save money with VURVhealth?
"When your current insurance doesn't cover the care you need."
"When you're not meeting a high insurance deductible."
Anyone stuck paying out-of-pocket for their health care can use VURVhealth. Here are a few common cases where VURVhealth can help you save time and money:

"No. VURV is an affordable solution to high out-of-pocket costs that are common with or without traditional insurance. Our plans provide you with savings on a wide range of health care and wellness services, and you'll get these discounts when you pay out-of-pocket with the provider instead of using insurance."
I already have insurance. Why do I need a VURVhealth membership?

"There are many common insurance cases where a VURVhealth membership could save you money.
Many insurance plans do not include vision or dental. Perhaps you are stuck paying thousands of dollars toward a deductible that you'll never meet. Or you just have the minimum insurance plan (aka \"catastrophic insurance\") that only covers the big stuff. Maybe you'd like to upgrade your insurance to cover more services, but the cost of doing so is ridiculously high.
If you're insured, but still paying out-of-pocket for the care you need, VURVhealth offers a hassle-free solution at an affordable price."
Will paying for health care with my VURVhealth membership count towards my deductible?

"You will need to contact your insurance provider to confirm whether purchases through VURVhealth count toward your deductible. In most cases, the answer will be no.
VURVhealth operates outside of any health insurance coverage you may have. Dealing with insurance reimbursements is a costly hassle for health care providers, so doctors and facilities offer discounts to patients who simply pay cash. VURVhealth maximizes those discounted rates for their members upfront without the hassle of forms or reimbursements."
What about the rest of my family?

"Your free VURVRx plan saves on prescriptions for the whole family. Even pets. Showing your Card at the pharmacy check-out will save you instantly, regardless of who the prescription is for.
You can add a family member to an already existing VURVhealth Family Discount Plan."

"VURVhealth is a subscription service that helps you find quality, affordable options when you're paying out-of-pocket for health care. We offer access to our nationwide database of discounted providers in return for a monthly or annual fee.
That's it. We do not sell your information, and we do not make a commission from referrals or your individual treatments."

Absolutely. Your trust is our top priority. VURVhealth will never sell or distribute any of your information. We help connect you to great, affordable health care providers, but your treatments and services are confidential between you and your provider.
All VURVhealth plan members subscribed to the Pulse Discount Plan.
How do I schedule an appointment with a VURVhealth medical doctor or service?

"Call the phone number associated with the doctor or facility within our directory to directly schedule an appointment. Because we continually update our database of providers, please call the doctor's office within 24 hours of your appointment to confirm their participation in the VURVhealth ValuePoint program by MultiPlan."
"How will the doctor's office know that I am part of VURVhealth?"

Upon arriving at your appointment, present your VURVhealth ID Card directly from the mobile app which features the ValuePoint by MultiPlan logo and member expiration date. You will not be able to participate in the discounted rates if you cannot show your valid VURVhealth ID Card and expiration date.
How do I know how much I owe for my medical office visit?

As an eligible VURVhealth ID Card holder, your discounts are offered only in exchange for payment in full at the time of medical service, or per a payment agreement between you and the medical provider.
"There is a provider listed in your network, but when I called to schedule an appointment I was told this provider doesn't participate with you."

"Although we update our database of providers daily, it's possible that providers drop out of the network or that personnel at the provider's office are unaware of their participation in the VURVhealth ValuePoint by MultiPlan program. If the provider indicates that they do not participate, please contact ValuePoint by MultiPlan directly at (866) 750-7427 to bring the matter to our attention. This telephone number is also listed on your VURVhealth ID Medical Card."
How do I make arrangements for admission into a medical facility?

For non-emergency services, select your facility from our database and call the admissions office directly to make an appointment and have your questions answered. The facility will require your VURVhealth ID Card information to verify eligibility in the ValuePoint by MultiPlan program over the phone or when you arrive at the facility.

"VURVhealth has partnered with ValuePoint by MultiPlan to give members access to medical providers that offer discounts to reduce the balance they owe the provider at the point of service so they'll know exactly how much they need to pay. This payment is to be made either in full, or per an agreed upon payment arrangement between the member and the medical provider."
How do I use my membership?

"First, use our convenient app or website to search for the closest providers of the type of health care you need.
Then, when you find the doctor or facility you like, simply use the phone number provided to schedule an appointment with the provider directly. Have your VURVhealth ID ready in case they need it. It's also a good idea to confirm your appointment the day before and double-check that they're still accepting VURVhealth plans.
Finally, on the day of your appointment, present your valid VURVhealth ID Card upon arrival so they know to offer you the special cash rates we've negotiated with them at checkout."
I just upgraded, when can I use my new VURVhealth plan?
"Right away! Once you've chosen a plan, you're eligible to save immediately. Simply find a provider in our database and schedule an appointment."
Where can I use my VURVhealth ID Card?

Our searchable database is constantly updated to keep you informed of the affordable health care options in your area. These options will vary based on your membership level. You can view the database on the VURVhealth app or on the web by clicking here.
How do I know how much I will spend and save using my membership?

"This will vary with every appointment, but know that using VURVhealth means you're getting the best discount on a provider's out-of-pocket rate.
Your provider should be able to quote you on the cost of your visit before you arrive. However, this price won't include any additional treatments or services that may occur during your visit. When you're paying out-of-pocket, it's always a good idea to ask your provider about additional costs before agreeing to treatment to avoid surprises."
I already have a provider I love, can I use VURVhealth with them?
"If they're in our database, yes! However, your VURVhealth Card will not work with providers that aren't included in the database."
"What if a provider from the database doesn't recognize VURVhealth or my VURVhealth ID?"

"Not to worry, it's possible the staff isn't familiar with VURVhealth. In this case, they can call 866-750-7427 with questions or for help. This number is also printed on your VURVhealth ID.
It's also possible this provider has dropped out of our network and the database hasn't updated yet. We're constantly updating our database to ensure you're best informed of your health care options."
"I'm shopping around and getting quotes, why are costs different between providers?"

"One provider may bill the same procedure differently than another, which can lead to price differences. It's not a bad idea to call ahead and get real numbers over the phone so you know what to expect when you pay for your visit.
Regardless, using VURVhealth will ensure you are getting a provider's lowest price."
Is there any additional paperwork or forms to fill out?
"Nope. Once you've created an account with us and signed up for a VURVhealth plan, you're done filling out paperwork."
How do I find the VURVhealth discount price on my medication?
Search our prescription database by inputting your medication and location. Your VURVhealth discount price will be listed with each matching pharmacy.
Why are prices different between pharmacies?

"Prices differ from city to city, and even pharmacy to pharmacy, based on the different deals pharmacies make with drug companies, which affect their pricing formulas and this changes constantly. It's always a good idea to check your prescription against the VURVhealth database before filling and refilling."
Can I use VURVRx to save on over-the-counter medications?

Yes, your VURVRx Card can also be used for over-the-counter medications written on a valid prescription pad with the appropriate GCN/NDC numbers associated with them, and on pet prescription medications purchased at a pharmacy.
No! Your VURVRx Card does not expire.
Are there limits to how often I can use my Card?
No! Your VURVRx Card has unlimited usage, save with it as often as you like.
"What if my pharmacist isn't familiar with VURVRx?"

"Don't panic. Some pharmacists aren't aware of the contracts their pharmacies have with us. They should process the Card like any normal insurance card, but if they have questions we have a support team ready 24/7 to help at (866) 921-7286. You can also reach out to us directly through our Contact Us page or at support@VURVhealth.com."
What do I do if I have prescription coverage with my health insurance?

The VURVhealth Rx Card can still help those with insurance. Have the pharmacist use the VURVhealth Rx Card instead of your insurance to see if the cost is lower. Oftentimes, our prices on certain prescriptions and brand name drugs are lower than insurance co-pays. See for yourself!
Does the VURVhealth Rx Card count towards my insurance deductible?

The VURVhealth Rx Card program will SOMETIMES count towards a deductible. As not all medical insurance plans are the same, we recommend users to contact their plan administrator to get the specific information regarding their medical insurance plan.
Can the VURVhealth Rx Card help Medicare users?

Although the VURVhealth Rx Card discount can be used as a Medicare Part D supplement by covering drugs once participants reach the \"donut hole,\" drugs purchased with this discount program will not count toward your Medicare deductible and therefore will not allow you to exceed your deductible and get out of the \"donut hole. \" We suggest you contact your plan administrator to get the specifics, because not all plans are the same.
"This program is a prescription drug coupon. This Card cannot be used in combination with any third-party payer program, including but not limited to Medicare and Medicaid."
For processing questions, please call Argus Health Systems, Inc. at (866) 770–4151.
Where can I use my free VURVRx ID Card?

Your free membership works at over 63,000 pharmacies nationwide, including local shops and major chains like Walgreens, CVS, Ride Aid, Walmart, & Target. You can search for the closest participating pharmacy using the VURVhealth app or on the web by clicking here.
All VURVhealth plan members receive a free Rx Membership. The VURVhealth Rx Card is included in all subscription packages: Rx, Pulse and Care Discount Plans.
How do I use my Card?

Simply present your digital Card from the VURVhealth mobile app to the pharmacist when you fill or refill a prescription. Discount amounts vary per prescription, with savings as high as 80% off retail prices.
Do I have to show my Card each time I go to the pharmacy?

"After your first visit using your VURVRx Card it should remain on file at that specific pharmacy. However, we recommend you present your Card at each visit to be sure yout're getting the savings you deserve."
What types of discounts are included?
20% discount off the WellVision Eye Exam
20% discount off frames and lenses when a complete pair of glasses is purchased
15% discount off contact lens exams, including fitting and evaluation
20% off lens options like progressives, scratch-resistant, and anti-reflective coatings
20% off additional glasses and sunglasses, including lens options, from any VSP doctor within 12 months of your last WellVision exam
Laser Vision Correction at 15% off the regular price or 5% off the promotional price; discounts only available from contracted facilities
"With your VURVhealth membership, you can choose a doctor from the nation's largest eye care doctor network which includes access to 23,000 nationwide locations and 34,000 participating providers."

VURVhealth and Vision Service Plan (VSP), help keep you and your eyes healthy through personalized care from doctors you can trust. Your eyes say a lot about you and can even tell your VSP doctor about you.

What is my VURVhealth Billing Account?

Your VURVhealth Billing Account is created at the time of enrollment into one of the VURVhealth plans. This account is different than your VURVhealth mobile app account and is only intended for the responsible billing party of your group or organization to manage all aspects relating to your VURVhealth subscription.
How do I manage my VURVhealth Billing Account?

You can manage all aspects of your VURVhealth Billing Account, including updating contact information, adding new payment methods, viewing and printing your current and past invoices, by logging into our Member Portal using your billing account email address and password.

The VURVhealth Member Portal is where the responsible billing party for a group or organization can manage all areas of their VURVhealth subscription including the following: add additional payment methods, update contact information, add a new address or update existing contact information and view and print invoices. You can login to the Member Portal by using your billing account email address and password.
How do I login to the VURVhealth Member Portal?

You can login to the VURVhealth Member Portal by clicking Login from the VURVhealth homepage and enter your VURVhealth Billing Account username and password. Please note, your VURVhealth Billing Account is separate and different then your VURVhealth mobile app account and is only available to the responsible party of the group or organization.
How do I upgrade or downgrade my current plan?

VURVhealth plans are designed to best meet your current needs. If you need to make a change to your plan and would like to upgrade or downgrade, please fill out a support request by going to our help page or by emailing us directly at help@vurvhealth.com and one of our amazing team members will follow up with you in order to best meet your needs. Please note, the responsible billing party is the only contact authorized to make changes to an account.
How do I add or remove members from an active subscription plan?

You can add or remove members from your VURVhealth membership at any time by sending a support request to help@vurvhealth.com or by going to our help page and submitting a ticket request. Please provide details of your change in membership numbers and one of our team members will be glad to help. Please note that all changes in membership numbers will be active on the future months as VURVhealth does NOT provide prorated refunds for the current month. Furthermore, the responsible billing party is the only contact authorized to make changes to an account.
How do I add a new Payment Method to my VURVhealth Billing Account?

Adding a new payment method to the VURVhealth Billing Account is easy. Simply login to the VURVhealth Member Portal using your billing account email address and password. Once you’re logged in, look for ‘Payment Methods’ in the navigation menu and follow the required steps to add the additional payment method.
How do I choose the Default credit card to be billed?

If you’ve added more than one payment method to your VURVhealth Billing Account, you have the option to select the preferred default payment method for upcoming invoices. Simply login to the VURVhealth Member Portal and select “Payment Methods” from the navigation menu. Scroll down to view your payment method options; click “Set as Default” for your preferred payment method. Please note, if you only have one payment method available this option will not be available to you.
How do I update my VURVhealth Billing Account Profile Information?

You can update your VURVhealth Billing Account information at any time by logging into the VURVhealth Member Portal and selecting the option “My Profile” from the navigation menu. From there, you can add a new address, or edit an existing address.
How do I add a New Contact Address?

You can add a new contact address by simply logging in to the Member Portal and selecting “My Profile.” From there, select the option to create a new address in the top left corner and complete the required steps.
Why am I receiving VURVhealth Billing Account emails?

If you are the responsible and authorized billing party for your group or organization and your email address was used to create the VURVhealth subscription, you are automatically subscribed and required to receive notices with regards to all aspects of your VURVhealth subscription. You can update this email address by logging into the Member Portal and updating your billing account contact information.
How can I look at my billing history and view specific, prior invoices?

You can look at your billing account history at any time by logging into the VURVhealth Member Portal. Once you’ve logged into the VURVhealth Member Portal, you can view a specific invoice by selecting “billing history” on the navigation menu. Simply click “view link” on the far right hand side of the invoice in question and the specific invoice details will be displayed for your review. If you would like to print an invoice in PDF simply select the print button under invoice details, from there you can download and save the PDF invoice.
How do I view upcoming and future invoices?

You can view all upcoming and future invoices by logging into the VURVhealth Member Portal. From there, you can view the current month’s invoice on the dashboard calendar. To view future invoices on a month by month basis, use the arrow keys on the top right corner of the calendar to navigate ahead to future months. From there, you will see the upcoming invoice and payment notification on the corresponding due date.
How can I download a copy of an invoice in PDF?

You can download a copy of both current and past invoices in PDF format by logging into the VURVhealth Member Portal and navigating to the “Billing History” tab. From there, select the appropriate invoice by clicking on “View Link.” Look for the Invoice Details section and select the print button in order to download and save a copy of your invoice in PDF.
How do I add my employees and activate our group or organizational account?
If you are part of an enterprise or group plan with VURVhealth, you will need to complete the employee list in order to activate the subscription.
Where can I find the employee list template to complete?

If you are part of an enterprise or group plan with VURVhealth, you will need to complete the employee list in order to activate your subscription. To do this, log into the VURVhealth Member Portal and navigate to the “Downloads” tab. From the Downloads page, you will see a link to download the Employee List template. Please complete the employee list according to the instructions provided in the worksheet and email the completed employee list to setup@vurvhealth.com so that a VURVhealth team member can complete your subscription activation. Please note, we are unable to activate subscriptions with incomplete worksheets.
How do I activate my group or enterprise account?

If you are part of an enterprise or group plan with VURVhealth you will need to complete the employee list in order to activate your subscription for all of your employees or members. To do this, please log into the VURVhealth Member Portal and navigate to the downloads tab. Please complete the employee list according to the instructions provided in the worksheet and email the completed employee list to setup@vurvhealth.com so that a VURVhealth team member can complete your subscription activation.
Do employees have access to the VURVhealth Billing Account and Member Portal?

If your group or organization is providing VURVhealth to employees as a Single Payor, then employees WILL NOT have access to the VURVhealth Billing Account Member Portal. Member Portal and Billing Account details will be designated to the authorized billing account representative within your group. Active subscribed employees will ONLY have access to the VURVhealth mobile app using their designated email address and password. Please note, if your group or organization requires employees to pay directly for VURVhealth network access, then each employee will be required to create their own VURVhealth billing account.
Why is my VURVhealth Billing Account login different from my VURVhealth Mobile App login?

In order to protect your privacy and safeguard against potential security threats, VURVhealth strategically designated two different sets of logins between authorized billing representatives and employees. Therefore, we require two different sets of logins. If you are part of a Single Payor group or organization and have questions about your VURVhealth plan or billing account, please contact the authorized representative within your group or organization. If you are an employee or member of a VURVhealth group plan and need assistance with your mobile app access, please fill out a support request by going to our help page or by emailing us directly at help@vurvhealth.com.
How do I cancel my subscription?

VURVhealth constantly strives to bring discounted health benefits to all of our active members. We understand that from time to time, needs change and you may wish to cancel an existing subscription. You can do so at any time by logging into the Member Portal or fill out a support request by going to our help page or by emailing us directly at help@vurvhealth.com. Please note, while you can cancel an active subscription at any time, VURVhealth does NOT prorate the current months network access fees and therefore cancellation requests of active subscriptions MUST be received before the 25th of the current month in order to terminate for the following month. Please refer to our billing terms and conditions for additional details.
How do I request a refund?

Refunds are available to new accounts within their first 30 days of subscribing, excluding the $20 one-time enrollment fee. VURVhealth does NOT provide prorated refunds on active subscriptions. If you believe you have been billed in error, please notify us immediately at help@vurvhealth.com or fill out a support request by going to our help page and one of our team members will assist you. For further details and information outlining VURVhealth billing policies, please view our terms and conditions.

Due to the discounted nature of VURVhealth’s network, we are unable to offer any prorated refunds at this time. If you believe you’ve been billed in error, we are happy to assist you. Notify us immediately at help@vurvhealth.com or fill out a support request by going to our help page and one of our team members will assist you.
How do I start a new subscription?

If you are not currently an active VURVhealth subscriber you can join the VURVhealth network at any time by visiting vurvhealth.com/plans and selecting the VURVhealth plan that best meets you and your organization’s needs. In the event that you are already an active subscriber and would like to add to an existing subscription, upgrade or downgrade an existing subscription, please email us at help@vurvhealth.com or complete a support ticket request and one of our support team members will assist you.
What payment options do you accept?

VURVhealth is pleased to accept any major credit or debit card from a US based authorized banking institution. For group or organizational accounts generating invoices greater than $7,500 per month in recurring billing, all payments must be made electronically via ACH (Automatic Clearing House).
Does VURVhealth accept cash for payments?
VURVhealth does not accept cash payments for membership or network access, but we do accept any major credit or debit card from a US based authorized banking institution.
When is my future rebilling date?

Your VURVhealth active subscription will automatically attempt to charge the default payment method on file based on the date of your original subscription. For example, if you signed up on the 5th of the month, your future rebilling date will be on the 5th of the next month. You can determine your future billing dates by logging into the VURVhealth Member Portal with your username and password. From there you can see your current invoice as well as navigate to future invoices on the dashboard calendar.
Is it possible to prepay future invoices?

Yes! You can prepay any future invoices for your current number of active members by logging into the VURVhealth Member Portal and selecting the dashboard link to navigate the calendar to view the desired month you wish to prepay. To do this, click the arrows on the top right of the calendar to the desired month and select the upcoming payment due date. Once selected, (if you have more than one payment option) select the payment method of choice by using the drop down menu under “Invoice Options”, then press the blue “Use Card” button. Next, click the green “Pay Invoice” button. You will then be asked to confirm payment.
My question wasn’t answered in the FAQ, how do I get help?
We’re always here to help. Use the Contact Us page on our website to get in touch or shoot us a note at support@VURVhealth.com.
